description: Supervised 250 hours professional experience. Internships conducted largely within the UQ Psychology Clinic, designed to extend skills in psychological assessment, therapy and report writing, and to develop understanding of professional issues.
prerequisites: PSYC7112, PSYC7191, PSYC7211, PSYC8301 and provisional or full registration as a psychologist with the Psychology Board of Australia.
restricted: MPsychClin, DPsych or with permission of the Director of Clinical Programs
